<td style="padding-top:20px;padding-left:15px;padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong data-stringify-type="bold" style="color:#000">Good morning. </strong>We interrupt your regularly scheduled GameStop programming with breaking news out the cereal industry: Apparently, there is a major shortage of Grape-Nuts. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As the brand manager <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/29/business/grape-nuts-shortage.html" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">explained</a> yesterday, “Grape-Nuts is made using a proprietary technology and a production process that isn’t easily replicated,” bamboozling its supply chain and thwarting production (which, it is important to note, involves neither grapes nor nuts).</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">We’ll stay on this story.<span class="c-message__edited_label" data-sk="tooltip_parent"> </span></p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
HEALTH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/29/jj-vaccine-data-shows-itll-effective-tool-fighting-virus?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Covid-19 Has Entered the Chat
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="An illustration of the Earth on a turquoise background with two needles filled with a red serum (symbolizing vaccines) injecting it from either side" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zMTUwL2NvdmlkLTE5X3ZhY2NpbmUuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Francis Scialabba</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As gripping as the GameStop saga is, we’ll begin today’s newsletter with more pressing developments for public health, the economy, and our ability to, you know, eat at a restaurant without four layers of clothing.</p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Yes, we're talking vaccines</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">And there’s good news to share: Yesterday, Johnson & Johnson said its Covid-19 vaccine was <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-29/j-j-single-dose-vaccine-provides-strong-shield-against-covid-19?srnd=premium&sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">66% effective</a> in preventing Covid-19 in a major clinical trial. That may not seem so great compared to the vaccines from Pfizer-BioNTech and Moderna, which are more than 90% effective, but health officials are celebrating it as a big win. Here’s why:</p>
<ol>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>This vaccine is a boss when it comes to stopping the worst instances of Covid, preventing 85% of severe disease and 100% of hospitalizations and deaths. “If you can prevent severe disease in a high percentage of individuals, that will alleviate so much of the stress and human suffering and death,” said Dr. Fauci.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Unlike the vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna, J&J’s requires </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/j-j-covid-19-vaccine-was-66-effective-in-late-stage-study-11611925201?mod=hp_lead_pos1&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">just one dose</a></span><span>. It also doesn’t need to be kept in Siberia-level temps to prevent spoilage like the others: it’ll stay fresh for three months in the standard refrigeration range of 35–46 degrees Fahrenheit.</span>
</li>
</ol>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Tying it all together: </strong>J&J’s vaccine won’t need to land many of the logistical somersaults required by the other two approved vaccines, which means it could supercharge the vaccination rollout in the coming months. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What about the other Covid-19 variants? </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This is where it gets a little trickier. J&J’s vaccine was more effective in the US than in other regions, including South Africa, where a new variant called B1351 is more prevalent. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>While new strains present significant challenges to vaccine developers, they weren’t unexpected...and they’re not an impossible hurdle to overcome. Vaccines may just need </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-29/covid-vaccines-may-need-adjusting-to-new-strains-scientists-say?srnd=premium&sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">adjustments</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Novavax, for example, is working on a booster shot that can fortify its original vaccine against new Covid-19 variants. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>J&J will apply for emergency use authorization next week, and it may get clearance in March.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">+ While we’re here: </strong>The EU <a href="https://apnews.com/article/eu-authorizes-astrazeneca-vaccine-adults-18b545dd51ea56f422ff28cdeb2dd08b?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">approved</a> AstraZeneca’s vaccine for adult use.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
MARKETS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/29/gamestop-surges-brokerages-lift-restrictions?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
When the GameStop Stories Don't Stop Coming
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Screenshot from Smash Mouth video" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zODk1L3NtYXNoX21vdXRoLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Smash Mouth/YouTube</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">After curbing trading of certain hyper-volatile “meme stocks” on Thursday, online brokerages like Robinhood <a href="https://www.usatoday.com/story/money/markets/2021/01/29/gamestop-stock-amc-surge-robinhood-lifts-some-trading-restrictions-reddit/4306166001/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">lifted</a> some of those restrictions yesterday, allowing retail traders to send AMC and GameStop flying once more. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>GameStop closed the day up 68% for a weekly gain of 400%. AMC popped 54% to close the week +278%. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Hedge funds are bending, but aren’t breaking</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Well, most of them. Citron Research, one of the most vocal firms to take a short position against GameStop, announced that it would stop publishing short-seller reports after it logged a 100% loss on some GameStop positions. But despite short-selling funds losing a <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/29/gamestop-short-sellers-are-still-not-surrendering-despite-nearly-20-billion-in-losses-this-year.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">collective ~$20 billion</a> so far this year, short interest in GameStop is only down 8% from last week. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>The volatility in the market has lawmakers and pundits split. Senator Elizabeth Warren is lobbying for more oversight of the brokerages that halted trading. “To have a healthy stock market, you’ve got to have a cop on the beat,” she said. (The SEC put out a statement yesterday saying it's "closely monitoring" recent activity in "certain stocks' trading prices.")</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But <em>Shark Tank</em>’s Kevin O'Leary doesn’t think the crazy swings are all bad. “[Investors] are learning about the risks of the market. We forgot to educate them in high school so let them learn in the real world, which is even better,” he said on CNBC.</p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
CRYPTOCURRENCY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/29/dogecoins-value-spiked-500?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Crypto’s Going to the Doges
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Dogecoin" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zODk2L2RvZ2Vjb2luLnBuZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em><a href="https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin" class="link" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">GitHub</a></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Seems like the writers of Earth are running out of material, because amateur traders on Reddit are banding together to push up the price of another asset: Dogecoin. The cryptocurrency <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/01/29/investing/dogecoin-surge-reddit-intl-hnk/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">spiked</a> more than 500% this week. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">And while a single Dogecoin isn’t worth much—just $0.0565 as of this writing, compared to bitcoin’s $35,000—what perked our ears isn’t the price, but the origin story: Dogecoin started as a joke.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The punchline? Based on 2013’s popular shiba inu meme, Dogecoin is a parody of bitcoin that was intended to poke fun at the concept of cryptocurrency. I.e., If any digital currency can be valuable, why not a digital currency based on a meme?</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">That punchline has gotten a lot more punchy recently, as members of the Reddit forum <a href="https://www.reddit.com/r/SatoshiStreetBets/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">r/SatoshiStreetBets</a> and elsewhere rallied to push Dogecoin’s value “to the moon.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>The wild trading in the stock market has spilled over to the world of cryptocurrencies—and so have the growing pains. Digital currency exchanges Coinbase and Bittrex both experienced outages Friday, while Robinhood temporarily paused instant deposits from cryptocurrency purchases.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FEEL GOOD
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/29/healthcare-workers-stuck-snowy-jam-give-covid19-vaccine-stranded-drivers?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Taking Matters Into Their Own Mittens
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="People getting vaccinated on a snowy road" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zODkzL3JvYWRzaWRlX3ZhY2NpbmVzLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Josephine County Public Health</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">On Thursday, healthcare workers in Oregon were on their way back from a vaccination site when a trailer crashed on a snowy road, stranding cars for hours. While most drivers would sigh and crank up the heat, these volunteers had to consider what to do with some <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/oregon-health-workers-administer-vaccines-snowstorm-stranded-motorists-n1256054?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">ultra-precious cargo</a>: six doses of the Covid-19 vaccine. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Rather than let the shots expire from lack of proper refrigeration, the volunteers went car-door-to-car-door asking stranded drivers if they wanted to be vaccinated. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">They got some takers:</strong></span><span> “We had one individual who was so happy, he took his shirt off and jumped out of the car,” Michael Weber, a public health director, </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/28/us/oregon-vaccine-stuck-in-the-snow-drivers.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">told the NYT</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line:</strong> Healthcare workers have already been deemed the MVPs of this pandemic, but the chilly heroes in Oregon said their decision was an easy one. “Our No. 1 rule right now is nothing gets wasted,” said Weber.</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
STOCKS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/01/29/gamestop-stock-rounding-everything-need-know?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Consuming GameStop Content Like
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Cookie monster eating cookies" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=377 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/HGe4zsOVo7Jvy/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Cookie monster eating cookies" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/HGe4zsOVo7Jvy/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This week’s GameStop news is a little like “Despacito”: You know you’re going to get sick of it at some point, but until then...hammer the repeat button.   </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">To help you better digest one of the most dramatic finance stories in years, we compiled insightful reads/listens/videos on the subject to fill your Saturday. </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The best long reads</h2>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Yes, there are </span><span><a href="https://www.newyorker.com/news/our-columnists/the-gamestop-saga-is-dangerous-and-all-too-familiar?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">shades of 1999</a></span><span> in this latest bout of trading mania.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>How Reddit investor “Roaring Kitty” </span><span><a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/01/29/technology/roaring-kitty-reddit-gamestop-markets.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">briefly turned</a></span><span> $53,000 into $48 million.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Animal extinctions and exponential feedback loops </span><span><a href="https://www.collaborativefund.com/blog/crazy/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">can help explain</a></span><span> GameStop. </span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The tug of war between amateurs and professionals has happened before...over </span><span><a href="https://ofdollarsanddata.com/when-they-start-to-lose-they-change-the-rules/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Piggly Wiggly grocery stores</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Looking at GameStop as an internet-led populist movement is both </span><span><a href="https://www.garbageday.email/p/who-will-we-be-after-gamestop?token=eyJ1c2VyX2lkIjo0NjIyNTQsInBvc3RfaWQiOjMxOTcxMjc5LCJfIjoid0V2eHAiLCJpYXQiOjE2MTE5Mzk3NjYsImV4cCI6MTYxMTk0MzM2NiwiaXNzIjoicHViLTkzMTciLCJzdWIiOiJwb3N0LXJlYWN0aW9uIn0.sT7AaFJfeC-V6cQ2ImBmMMZaIimq_UQxgME04AEFc_g&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sobering</a></span><span> and </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/gamestop-bitcoin-and-qanon-how-the-wisdom-of-crowds-became-the-anarchy-of-the-mob-11611928823?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">important</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The question we’re all asking: </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2021-01-28/knowing-when-to-sell-gamestop-stock-at-the-top-is-impossible?sref=ExbtjcSG&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">How does this end</a></span><span>?  </span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The best podcasts</h2>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Scott Galloway and Kara Swisher give their </span><span><a href="https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/pivot/id1073226719?i=1000506987371&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">two cents</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>A great </span><span><a href="https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cDovL2ZlZWRzLmJsb29tYmVyZy5mbS9CTE0yMDA5ODM3NDc3/episode/YTQ1M2E5MDgtNjFkZi0xMWViLWI1MjUtNWY0ODI2YTZmYzc4?hl=en&ved=2ahUKEwjg1qKC08HuAhVNF1kFHZjVBtIQjrkEegQIBRAF&ep=6&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">high-level breakdown</a></span><span> of the entire saga.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Last April, the Brew’s Kinsey Grant </span><span><a href="https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/if-you-cant-beat-em-join-em-how-traders-react-in-a-crisis/id1480059697?i=1000470280622&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">spoke with Jaime Rogozinski,</a></span><span> founder of the infamous Reddit forum r/WallStreetBets.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">The best from social media </h2>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Two </span><span><a href="https://twitter.com/MorningBrew/status/1354138766307336192?s=20&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">excellent</a></span><span> </span><span><a href="https://twitter.com/ShaanVP/status/1353951035224694785?s=20&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">explanations</a></span><span> of what exactly happened.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Reddit’s fascination with GameStop </span><span><a href="https://twitter.com/endtwist/status/1354547622133051393?s=20&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">stretches back</a></span><span> to September 2019.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Robinhood destroyed </span><span><a href="https://twitter.com/businessbarista/status/1354789569221300226?s=20&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">7 years of goodwill</a></span><span> in less than a day.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Brew writer Jamie Wilde told Twitter about </span><span><a href="https://twitter.com/jamiekaywilde/status/1354507160147742721?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">her experience</a></span><span> with GameStop trading.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The GameStop saga will ripple </span><span><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/CKmOok_Fw80/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">far into the future</a></span><span>.</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"></p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAs gripping as the GameStop saga is, we’ll begin today’s newsletter with more pressing developments for public health, the economy, and our ability to, you know, eat at a restaurant without four layers of clothing.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eYes, we're talking vaccines\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAnd there’s good news to share: Yesterday, Johnson \u0026 Johnson said its Covid-19 vaccine was \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-29/j-j-single-dose-vaccine-provides-strong-shield-against-covid-19?srnd=premium\u0026sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e66% effective\u003c/a\u003e in preventing Covid-19 in a major clinical trial. That may not seem so great compared to the vaccines from Pfizer-BioNTech and Moderna, which are more than 90% effective, but health officials are celebrating it as a big win. Here’s why:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003col\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThis vaccine is a boss when it comes to stopping the worst instances of Covid, preventing 85% of severe disease and 100% of hospitalizations and deaths. “If you can prevent severe disease in a high percentage of individuals, that will alleviate so much of the stress and human suffering and death,” said Dr. Fauci.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eUnlike the vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna, J\u0026J’s requires \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/j-j-covid-19-vaccine-was-66-effective-in-late-stage-study-11611925201?mod=hp_lead_pos1\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ejust one dose\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e. It also doesn’t need to be kept in Siberia-level temps to prevent spoilage like the others: it’ll stay fresh for three months in the standard refrigeration range of 35–46 degrees Fahrenheit.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ol\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eTying it all together: \u003c/strong\u003eJ\u0026J’s vaccine won’t need to land many of the logistical somersaults required by the other two approved vaccines, which means it could supercharge the vaccination rollout in the coming months. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhat about the other Covid-19 variants? \u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThis is where it gets a little trickier. J\u0026J’s vaccine was more effective in the US than in other regions, including South Africa, where a new variant called B1351 is more prevalent. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eWhile new strains present significant challenges to vaccine developers, they weren’t unexpected...and they’re not an impossible hurdle to overcome. Vaccines may just need \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2021-01-29/covid-vaccines-may-need-adjusting-to-new-strains-scientists-say?srnd=premium\u0026sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eadjustments\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eNovavax, for example, is working on a booster shot that can fortify its original vaccine against new Covid-19 variants. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eJ\u0026J will apply for emergency use authorization next week, and it may get clearance in March.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e+ While we’re here: \u003c/strong\u003eThe EU \u003ca style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eapproved\u003c/a\u003e AstraZeneca’s vaccine for adult use.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAfter curbing trading of certain hyper-volatile “meme stocks” on Thursday, online brokerages like Robinhood \u003ca href=\"https://www.usatoday.com/story/money/markets/2021/01/29/gamestop-stock-amc-surge-robinhood-lifts-some-trading-restrictions-reddit/4306166001/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elifted\u003c/a\u003e some of those restrictions yesterday, allowing retail traders to send AMC and GameStop flying once more. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eGameStop closed the day up 68% for a weekly gain of 400%. AMC popped 54% to close the week +278%. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eHedge funds are bending, but aren’t breaking\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWell, most of them. Citron Research, one of the most vocal firms to take a short position against GameStop, announced that it would stop publishing short-seller reports after it logged a 100% loss on some GameStop positions. But despite short-selling funds losing a \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/01/29/gamestop-short-sellers-are-still-not-surrendering-despite-nearly-20-billion-in-losses-this-year.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecollective ~$20 billion\u003c/a\u003e so far this year, short interest in GameStop is only down 8% from last week. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eThe volatility in the market has lawmakers and pundits split. Senator Elizabeth Warren is lobbying for more oversight of the brokerages that halted trading. “To have a healthy stock market, you’ve got to have a cop on the beat,” she said. (The SEC put out a statement yesterday saying it's \"closely monitoring\" recent activity in \"certain stocks' trading prices.\")\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBut \u003cem\u003eShark Tank\u003c/em\u003e’s Kevin O'Leary doesn’t think the crazy swings are all bad. “[Investors] are learning about the risks of the market. We forgot to educate them in high school so let them learn in the real world, which is even better,” he said on CNBC.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-top: 12px;\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.morningbrew.com%2Fdaily%2Fstories%2F2021%2F01%2F29%2Fgamestop-surges-brokerages-lift-restrictions\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"text-decoration: none;\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"\" style=\"display: inline-block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8zODk2L2RvZ2Vjb2luLnBuZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin\" class=\"link\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eGitHub\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eSeems like the writers of Earth are running out of material, because amateur traders on Reddit are banding together to push up the price of another asset: Dogecoin. The cryptocurrency \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/01/29/investing/dogecoin-surge-reddit-intl-hnk/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003espiked\u003c/a\u003e more than 500% this week. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAnd while a single Dogecoin isn’t worth much—just $0.0565 as of this writing, compared to bitcoin’s $35,000—what perked our ears isn’t the price, but the origin story: Dogecoin started as a joke.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe punchline? Based on 2013’s popular shiba inu meme, Dogecoin is a parody of bitcoin that was intended to poke fun at the concept of cryptocurrency. I.e., If any digital currency can be valuable, why not a digital currency based on a meme?\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThat punchline has gotten a lot more punchy recently, as members of the Reddit forum \u003ca href=\"https://www.reddit.com/r/SatoshiStreetBets/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003er/SatoshiStreetBets\u003c/a\u003e and elsewhere rallied to push Dogecoin’s value “to the moon.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eThe wild trading in the stock market has spilled over to the world of cryptocurrencies—and so have the growing pains. Digital currency exchanges Coinbase and Bittrex both experienced outages Friday, while Robinhood temporarily paused instant deposits from cryptocurrency purchases.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL href=\"https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/oregon-health-workers-administer-vaccines-snowstorm-stranded-motorists-n1256054?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRather than let the shots expire from lack of proper refrigeration, the volunteers went car-door-to-car-door asking stranded drivers if
